credentials: International business consulting firm with offices in Orange County, California and Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
Business Lawyers and Trading Experts in One Consulting Firm
Leader in U.S. & South-East Asia trade relations
Specializes in L-1 Visas, Vietnam Citizenship, U.S. Company Formation, and international franchising

metaAds.details: Not running Facebook/Instagram/LinkedIn ads. With international clientele across US, Vietnam, Singapore, and Thailand, you're missing high-value entrepreneurs searching on social platforms 24/7.

googleAds.details: BLUE OCEAN: Zero competitors advertising for 'L-1 visa lawyer Orange County' or 'Vietnam citizenship consultant.' You could own these high-intent searches immediately.

support24x7.details: CRITICAL: Your clients are in Singapore (12hr time difference), Vietnam (14hr time difference), Thailand (13hr time difference). When they call during THEIR business hours (your midnight-6am), they get voicemail. Your competitors with 24/7 intake capture these international clients instantly.

websiteSpeed.details: Website loads in 2.1s - acceptable but could be faster

crm.details: Manual follow-up across multiple time zones wastes 20+ hrs/week and loses 40% of international leads. Automated nurture in multiple languages would improve close rates 25-40%.

competitors: International business consulting firms with automated follow-up
Law firms running Google Ads for L-1 visas
